snippet: New York City’s Fire Department will receive additional funding in an effort to reduce ambulance response times.
abstract: New York City's Fire Dept will receive additional funding to improve medical response times under new budget proposal from Mayor Bill de Blasio; funds will allow department to add 45 ambulance shifts and employ 149 more Emergency Medical Service dispatchers.
lead_paragraph: New York City’s Fire Department will receive additional funding in an effort to reduce ambulance response times.

headline.main: De Blasio Aims to Improve Medical Response Times
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Aims to Improve Medical Response Times
